lead_paragraph: Laura Weightman expressed disappointment at British Athletics' decision to stop her funding following the 25-year-old's 11th place finish in the 2016 Rio Olympics 1,500 meters final, which she suggested may have been partly due to drug cheats ahead of her.

headline.print_headline: Weightman Disappointed at Funding Cut After Reaching Rio Final
headline.main: Weightman Disappointed at Funding Cut After Reaching Rio Final
